snippet.title: Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot - 1.0 Release Date Announcement ☣️
snippet.description:
Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot is sliding out of Early Access on October 31st! To celebrate the release date announcement, we've released a new update featuring new Survival mode and quality-of-life enhancements.
☣️ Play now: https://tblink.co/Slime3k

Year 3000. Humanity is done for. The surviving fraction is ruled by Despot, a cruel AI eager for hideous experiments. A blob of goo created by Despot to engineer artificial human beings has become sentient and risen up against its creator. This blob of goo goes by the name of Slime and desires one thing only: сhaotic violence. Build your deck of ability cards, grow weapons from your "body," survive relentless onslaughts of enemies across multiple challenging levels, and take on the terrifying Despot himself!

Version 1.0 will bring ten new levels, fresh abilities, a total rebalance of the old ones, and other content. And yeah, an old "friend" will be waiting for you at the end as the final boss. See you on Halloween! 🎃

👥 Join the community:
🌐 Discord: https://discord.gg/XS7S76WJe5
🌐 Twitter (X): https://twitter.com/despotism_3k
🌐 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@despots.games
🌐 Steam forums: https://steamcommunity.com/app/2348610/discussions/
🌐 Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DespotsGame/
